Logistics Overview: Logistics Fundamentals
   
  What Is Logistics?  
         
 

Over the years, the term logistics has been used to describe a variety of things. Click on each of the two reference locations -- The American Production and Inventory Control Society (APICS) and Joint Publication (JP) 1-02 -- below to view the definitions.
